mapper.select: select t.ruleId as ruleId,t.voltageLevel as voltageLevel,t.industry as industry,t.strategy as strategy, e.transformer_capacity_price as transformerCapacityPrice, e.max_capacity_price as maxCapacityPrice, e.consumption_price as consumptionPrice,e.distribution_price as distributionPrice, e.gov_add_price as govAddPrice ,e.sharp_price as sharpPrice, e.peak_price as peakPrice, e.level_price as levelPrice,e.valley_price as valleyPrice from (select r.id as ruleId,r.industry,r.strategy,r.voltage_level as voltageLevel from electricity_price_rule r where r.structure_id=#{structureId} and r.state=0) t left join electricity_price e on t.rule_id=e.rule_id and r.state=0
